title: Meet Robert Abare, our new communications assistantIN: IN THE FIELD (10/14/15) (Afterschool Alliance)
text: ( Source : Afterschool Alliance ) Greetings readers of Afterschool Snack ! My name is Robert Abare , and I'm excited to introduce myself as the Afterschool Alliance's new Communications Assistant. I joined the Afterschool Alliance after two
